name: cacciatore
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe Italian dishes that are prepared using tomatoes, onions, herbs, and sometimes wine: This is a great recipe for chicken cacciatore. He generally uses the rabbits to make a stew, perhaps a rabbit cacciatore.
More examplesFewer examplesThe rustic dishes on the menu of slow cooked meats like chicken cacciatore are deeply warming.My favourite fresh tomato recipe is chicken cacciatore.The main courses include chicken or veal cacciatore, aubergine parmigiana, and calzones.
